text: You jing ren [youtai jiaotu] qingqiu ni [mu sheng] cong tianshang jiang gei tamen yi bu jingdian, tamen que yi xiang mu sa qingqiuguo bi zhe geng zhongda de.[Dangshi], tamen [dui mu sa] shuo:“Qing ni rang women qinyan kanjian an la ba!” Yushi leidian yin tamen bu yi er xijile tamen. Ranhou, zai mingzheng jianglin tamen hou, tamen reng chongbai niudu, dan wo haishi kuan shu liao ci shi. Wo ciyu mu sa mingxian de zhengju.
